posts.title: Variables, User Input & Math Operations
posts.description: Started my daily programming practice focusing on basic logic, user input handling, and small utility functions.

posts.title: JavaScript logic and user-interaction exercises
posts.description: Worked on interactive JS exercises using prompts, loops, validations, and arithmetic operations to strengthen core logic and problem-solving skills.

posts.title: Conditional Structures
posts.description: JavaScript exercises practicing conditional logic: character validation, day classification, even/odd check, and string length validation.

posts.title: Extra Conditional Exercises
posts.description: Additional JavaScript exercises using conditional logic: palindrome check, cinema discount, string concatenation, score validation, letter checks, grade evaluation, monthly discount, parity check, and car-rental fee calculation.

posts.title: Nested Conditionals & Logic Exercises
posts.description: JavaScript practice focused on switch cases, arithmetic operations, nested conditionals, user-input flows, and multi-criteria evaluation.
